title: Geographical facts with images
original_prompt:
Please generate a fact about a geographical location. include an image of the location.

##for generating images, please use markdown, and do not use backslash, do not use code blocks. Please use unsplashi API( https://source.unsplash.com/1280x720/?<PUT IMAGE DESCRIPTION HERE>.
input1: The Great Barrier Reef, located off the coast of Queensland, Australia, is the world's largest coral reef system, stretching over 2,300 kilometers and home to a diverse range of marine life. ![Great Barrier Reef](https://source.unsplash.com/1280x720/?Great-Barrier-Reef)
input2: Mount Kilimanjaro, the highest peak in Africa, stands at 5,895 meters above sea level and is a popular destination for trekkers and climbers from around the world. ![Mount Kilimanjaro](https://source.unsplash.com/1280x720/?Mount-Kilimanjaro)
